artifacts.advancements.chest_slayer.desc: Send a Possessed Coffer to Davy Jones' locker
artifacts.tooltip.item.antidote_vessel: Greatly decreases th' time of any foul brews
artifacts.tooltip.item.aqua_dashers: Allows ye to walk over the seas
artifacts.tooltip.item.bunny_hoppers.fal: Allows ye to fall without takin' damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.bunny_hoppers.jum: Allows ye to leap like a rabbit
artifacts.tooltip.item.charm_of_sinking: Allows ye to walk under the seas
artifacts.tooltip.item.cloud_in_a_bottle: Allows ye to leap while in the air
artifacts.tooltip.item.cross_necklace: Increases th' length of invincibility when ye take damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.crystal_heart: Increases the sturdiness of yer hull
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.drin: Allows ye to drink yer grog faster
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.spec: 'Hey! I'm #1, and I let gravity do my drinking!'
artifacts.tooltip.item.fire_gauntlet: Makes yer attacks cause flame damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.flame_pendant.fir: Protects ye from fire after settin' an attacker aflame
artifacts.tooltip.item.flame_pendant.str: Has a chance to set attackers aflame
artifacts.tooltip.item.golden_hook: Gives ye more balls o' wisdom from creatures ye send to Davy Jones' Locker
artifacts.tooltip.item.helium_flamingo.k: Press %s while in th' skies to start swimmin'
artifacts.tooltip.item.helium_flamingo.s: Allows ye to swim in th' skies for as long as ye can hold yer breath
artifacts.tooltip.item.lucky_scarf.multi: Gives ye more treasure from blocks ye dig
artifacts.tooltip.item.lucky_scarf.singl: Gives ye more treasure from blocks ye dig
artifacts.tooltip.item.night_vision_gogg: Allows ye to see in the dark
artifacts.tooltip.item.obsidian_skull: Gives you Flame's Bane for a short while when ye are hurt by embers
artifacts.tooltip.item.panic_necklace: Increases yer Landlubbin' speed after takin' damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.pocket_piston: Increases blowback dealt by yer attacks
artifacts.tooltip.item.running_shoes.ste: Makes ye step higher when wobblin' at speed
artifacts.tooltip.item.shock_pendant.lig: Protects ye from th' Flash o' the Skies
artifacts.tooltip.item.shock_pendant.str: Has a chance to strike attackers with th' Flash o' the Skies
artifacts.tooltip.item.snorkel: Allows ye to breathe when overboard
artifacts.tooltip.item.steadfast_spikes: Helps ye keep yer footing during stormy seas
artifacts.tooltip.item.superstitious_hat: Gives ye more plunder from creatures ye send to Davy Jones' locker
Gives ye more plunder from creatures ye send to Davy Jones' locker
artifacts.tooltip.item.thorn_pendant: Has a chance to damage attackers
artifacts.tooltip.item.umbrella.glider: Can be used to soften yer fall
artifacts.tooltip.item.umbrella.shield: Can be wielded as a targe
artifacts.tooltip.item.vampiric_glove: Allows ye to absorb the life force of creatures ye punch
artifacts.tooltip.item.villager_hat: Increases yer bartering skills with Landlubbers
item.artifacts.shock_pendant: Jewel o' Flash o' the Skies
